title: All Ball - Duke and Sparty Finally Rollin'; Lakers Video Coordinator Max Hooper on Luka, Beal, Lillard, Steph Scouting Reports
itunes:title: All Ball - Duke and Sparty Finally Rollin'; Lakers Video Coordinator Max Hooper on Luka, Beal, Lillard, Steph Scouting Reports
description:
In this episode, Doug gives his take on Michigan State and Duke starting to roll after slow starts, and is joined by Lakers Video Coordinator Max Hooper. They discuss the day-to-day grind of breaking down tape for the Lakers, what he's seen on tape from stars like Luka, Bradley Beal, Dame Lillard, and Steph Curry. Make sure you download, rate and subscribe here to get the latest All Ball Podcasts!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
